text: Hey Vandia, thank you very much
for joining us in AWS office.
As a representative of Smart City Consortium,
I would like to ask you a few questions.
How does Smart City Consortium position
the concept of Smart City?
In the view of Smart City Consortium,
Smart City should be an ecosystem.
We hope to build a safe,
real-time big data environment to enable government
and corporates to utilize big data more effectively,
and develop smart use cases.
Have you encounter any difficulties
when realizing your vision of Smart City?
The difficulty we faced is the amount of,
data in the future, when 5G is popularized,
the volume of data will increase drastically.
A lot of corporates don’t have experience in
dealing with such a volume of data resources,
to develop use cases.
Thus, a lot of corporates don’t realize
the value of the use cases.
I think this is a big obstacle
when promoting smart city technology.
You mentioned a few technologies,
which one does Smart City Consortium prioritize promoting?
In Smart City Consortium, we have already
launched eID, IoT and 3D geographical system.
These are the projects that Smart City Consortium
has been focusing in the past few years.
Currently, we hope to further
promote big data technology.
I believe big data technology is not mature enough.
We can enhance the ability to generate
and collect data in Hong Kong.
Automated Machine Learning
is another prioritized technology.
As it will allow corporates in Hong Kong
to utilize big data more easily.
You mentioned cloud technology previously,
I would like to ask a question.
How do you position
cloud technology in Smart City?
We hope that cloud technology providers
can act as an incubator for Smart City,
help developing more use cases,
for example setup showrooms or laboratories.
We hope that through an AI enabled cloud services,
corporates can reduce their data analytical demand,
and manpower demand.
Thus they can utilize data more easily.
I think this is the main benefit for corporates.
I definitely learnt a lot today.
I just realize Smart City Consortium
has been working on so many projects.
Thank you Vandia for coming over to our office.
Thank you very much.
